name: oli-electron
description: Electron desktop app for o|i CDN Demo - bypasses CORS and enables native network monitoring

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run compile && electron .
scripts.compile: tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json && mv dist/main/preload.js dist/main/preload.cjs
scripts.build: npm run build:vite && npm run build:electron
